tool_description: Searches for books using keywords, titles, or general terms across multiple book databases and catalogs.

search_query.description: Search terms, keywords, or book titles to find

search_type.description: Type of search: general, title, keyword, or isbn

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return (1-500)

error_messages: Empty search query: Provide a non-empty search_query string.
Invalid search type: Use one of [general, title, keyword, isbn].
Invalid max_results: Must be an integer between 1 and 500.
Search timeout: The search request took too long to complete, try a more specific query.
usage: Provide search_query with your search terms. Optionally specify search_type for more targeted results and max_results to limit output size.

total_found.description: Total number of books found matching the search

book_titles.description: Array of book titles corresponding to book_ids

search_summary.description: Brief summary of search results and criteria used
